title: Galaxy Buds 2 updated with 360 Audio feature from the Galaxy Buds Pro
content:
Samsung released the Galaxy Buds Pro last year, as a competitor to Apple’s AirPods Pro. The earbuds included a 360 Audio feature, which changes the direction of audio to match head movements, similar to Apple’s ‘Spatial Audio’ on the AirPods 3 and other headphones. Now the functionality is coming to the Galaxy Buds 2, thanks

The post Galaxy Buds 2 updated with 360 Audio feature from the Galaxy Buds Pro appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung is rolling out an update for the Galaxy Buds 2, with the same 360 Audio feature that first appeared on the Galaxy Buds Pro.
